sourcesContent:
Add Vacation

Title is required

Category is required

Description is required

Destination is required

Img_url is required

Date Start is required

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import axios from 'axios'; import { StateService } from '../service/shared.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-new-vacation', templateUrl: './new-vacation.component.html', styleUrls: ['./new-vacation.component.scss'] }) export class NewVacationComponent { closeModal(){ } }
